captions.text: It has everything you could want.
You guys look like you have a beautiful life around here.
I love the diversity of the city.
There's so many different cultures and many different people from all over the world here.
Firstly I'm going to say the food. Secondly I'll probably go with the food.
But I love the, sort of, artistic spirit here.
Every time I'm here there's new cultural activity and beautiful museum exhibits.
More than anything I love the fans that we've met here in Toronto.
I mean there are fans really literally wrapping around the block. I've never experienced anything like that.
People in Toronto - this community loves film. I mean, really loves film.
You guys are enthusiastic - that's so nice.
It's really nice out there; the people have been really cool.
This city has always been so great to me. It's what makes us want to come here.
So it feels like a little bit of a home away from home for us.
It's really nice to be home.

title: A Home Away from Home: Celebrities at TIFF Talk Toronto
